name: Welder Wielder
description:
Use your trusty welding torch and jetpack to overcome a tide of deadly metal barrels!

Made with the use of this lovely tile set: https://trixelized.itch.io/kinda-cute-forest

And Abstraction's wonderful tunes:  www.abstractionmusic.com

All other art by me :)

GMTK 2021 submission
